## LinkedIn Post

**Launching KryptoTrac: A Privacy-First Crypto Portfolio Tracker**

After 6 months of development, I'm excited to launch KryptoTrac - a modern cryptocurrency portfolio tracker built for privacy-conscious Canadian investors.

**The Problem:**
Existing crypto trackers require exchange API access, creating security vulnerabilities and privacy concerns. For Canadians, most tools lack CAD pricing and tax-ready exports.

**The Solution:**
KryptoTrac tracks prices, not your personal data. Your holdings never leave your device. No exchange linking required.

**Key Features:**
- Real-time price updates from CoinGecko
- AI-powered portfolio insights
- Smart price alerts
- Tax export functionality
- CAD pricing built-in
- Beautiful, fast interface

**Tech Stack:**
Next.js 16, React 19, Supabase, Stripe, AI SDK, Tailwind CSS

**Business Model:**
Freemium - generous free tier with Pro features ($9.99 CAD/month) for advanced users. Transparent affiliate partnerships with exchanges.

Try it free: [your-domain.com]

I'd love your feedback! What features matter most in a portfolio tracker?

#CryptoCurrency #ProductLaunch #NextJS #FinTech #Privacy #BuiltInPublic

Hey r/CryptoCurrency!

I've been working on KryptoTrac for the past 6 months and just launched it publicly. It's a portfolio tracker that respects your privacy.

**Why I built this:**
I got tired of giving exchange API keys to portfolio trackers. The security risk always bothered me. So I built something different.

**What makes it different:**
- No exchange account linking
- Your holdings data stays on your device
- Real-time price updates every 30 seconds
- AI insights for portfolio optimization
- Free forever tier with generous limits

**Features:**

- Smart price alerts
